SEARCH
Module com.example.platformerplain
Package com.platformer.escape_beyond.controller

Class OptionController

java.lang.Object
com.platformer.escape_beyond.controller.OptionController
public class OptionController extends Object
Controller class for the Options page in the game. This allows the player to select a character, change the background color, and return to the home screen.

    • Switch_toHome

      public void Switch_toHome(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Handles the action when the user clicks on the close button. Navigates back to the Home screen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The mouse event triggered by clicking the close button.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while switching the screen.
